```{r include = FALSE}
library(packageSkeletonForR)
is_html_output = function() {
  knitr::opts_knit$get("rmarkdown.pandoc.to")=="html"
}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
    collapse = TRUE,
    comment = "",
    prompt=TRUE,
    fig.dpi = 96
			)
if (is_html_output()) {
    options(width=1000)
}
```
